dialog.text: We no longer consider the Nephites our enemies. All you ever wanted was to protect your own lands and freedoms. I hope our peoples can put the bloodshed behind us and begin to build a fruitful relationship.
You won't find Tubaloth here. He has fled with his armies to another city.
Why, oh why did I join the Gadianton Robbers?
Our king was weak. But I've joined the Gadianton Robbers, and we will end you!
Ha! Good luck figuring out which city our king is at.
